content.rendered:
Career & University Guidance

STUDENT COUNCIL

The mission of the CGB’s University and Career Counseling program is to help students set realistic goals in both career and university choices based on an honest and thorough evaluation of their aptitudes, interests, and values, in order to determine their best fit universities.

Ms. Iszler

VISIT THE OFFICIAL CUG WEBSITE

“Our University & Career Guidance Programme lasts throughout a student’s entire Secondary journey at CGB. We do not see the university & career guidance process as something that begins just before students apply for university, but something that is a long-term process that is years in the planning.

As students develop throughout Secondary, the University & Career Guidance Programme develops as well – beginning with possible university courses and career exploration based on interests at age 11, and ending with targeted one-to-one support in applications by the time the students leave school.

Our uniquely international community and experience places us amongst the best placed schools in Colombia to find the right university and career for each student.”

Mr. Regan
Head of Secondary 

Email your counselor Ms. Iszler at universityguidance@cgb.edu.co

UNIVERSITY VISITS

Every year CGB welcomes more than 100 universities from all over the world. These visits strengthen our connections with universities and open doors for our students. Our counselor keeps information on these universities in her office, stop by if you want to learn more.

AUSTRALIA

  • University of Queensland 

CANADA

  • Toronto Metropolitan University 
  • University of Toronto 
  • MacEwan University 
  • Dalhousie University 
  • University of Calgary 
  • University of Victoria
